SEARCH
Package com.meteordevelopments.duels.api.user

Interface UserManager

public interface UserManager
Represents the UserManager singleton used by Duels.

  • Method Details

    • isLoaded

      boolean isLoaded()
      Whether or not had all users completed loading to the memory.
      Returns:
      True if all users have completed loading to the memory. False otherwise.

    • get

      @Nullable User get(@NotNull String name)
      Gets a User with the given name. Note: If isLoaded() returns false, this may return null even if userdata file exists.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the user to get.
      Returns:
      User with the given name or null if not exists.

    • get

      @Nullable User get(@NotNull UUID uuid)
      Gets a User with the given UUID. Note: If isLoaded() returns false, this may return null even if userdata file exists.
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID of the user to get.
      Returns:
      User with the given UUID or null if not exists.

    • get

      @Nullable User get(@NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Calls get(UUID) with Entity.getUniqueId().
      See Also:
      • get(UUID)

    • getTopWins

      @Nullable UserManager.TopEntry getTopWins()
      Gets the top wins. thread-safe!
      Returns:
      UserManager.TopEntry containing name and wins of the top 10 Wins or null if the leaderboard has not loaded yet.

    • getTopLosses

      @Nullable UserManager.TopEntry getTopLosses()
      Gets the top losses. thread-safe!
      Returns:
      UserManager.TopEntry containing name and losses of the top 10 Losses or null if the leaderboard has not loaded yet.

    • getTopRatings

      @Nullable UserManager.TopEntry getTopRatings()
      Gets the top rating for no kit. thread-safe!
      Returns:
      UserManager.TopEntry containing name and rating of the top 10 Rating for no kit or null if the leaderboard has not loaded yet.
      Since:
      3.3.0

    • getTopRatings

      @Nullable UserManager.TopEntry getTopRatings(@NotNull Kit kit)
      Gets the top rating for the given Kit. thread-safe!
      Parameters:
      kit - Kit to get UserManager.TopEntry.
      Returns:
      UserManager.TopEntry containing name and rating of the top 10 Rating for kit or null if the leaderboard has not loaded yet.
